phrases.phrase:
[FA]fa-star[/FA] - Embed a FontAwesome [COLOR=#00b300][FA]fa-check-circle[/FA][/COLOR] - Embed a FontAwesome with color [FA]fa-star fa-2x[/FA] - Enlarge an icon from 1 to 5x
[FA]fa-spinner fa-spin[/FA] - Rotation animation 360° [FA]fa-spinner fa-pulse[/FA] - Rotation pulsation 360°
[FA]fa-shield fa-rotate-90[/FA] - Rotation 90° [FA]fa-shield fa-rotate-180[/FA] - Rotation 180° [FA]fa-shield fa-rotate-270[/FA] - Rotation 270° [FA]fa-shield fa-flip-horizontal[/FA] - Horizontal leveling [FA]fa-shield fa-flip-vertical[/FA] - Vertical setting

- Embed a FontAwesome
- Embed a FontAwesome with color
- Enlarge an icon from 1 to 5x

- Rotation animation 360°
- Rotation pulsation 360°

- Rotation 90°
- Rotation 180°
- Rotation 270°
- Horizontal leveling
- Vertical setting
